name: A Puzzling Combination
description:
This game was made for LUDUM DARE 41 ! The theme was : Combine 2 incompatible genres !

Rules : Change shape with the LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys !

For more from me, visit my YOUTUBE CHANNEL : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g/videos?view_as=subscrib...

Thanks for playing :) !
